definition: to inspect/to examine/to be aware/to pay a visit (to one's parents or elders)
to save/to economize/to do without/to omit/to leave out/province/(archaic) central government department

sentences.english: If she is half as sharp as her mother, she is saving enough.
sentences.chinese: 她只要有她媽媽一半那麼精明，就夠省儉的了。

sentences.english: Although very rich, he still leads an economical life.
sentences.chinese: 富有，但依然過着省儉的生活。
